name: DRILL BILL (Aurel)
description:
Top 10 Leaderboards

DRILL BILL enters the Temple of Steam and Punk, only to find a security system based on colourful blocks. This must be the work of the evil blob king! Help DRILL BILL drill his way to find the ultimate reward.

Controls
  • WASD or arrows to move
  • Space or X or Ctrl to jump and double jump
  • Mouse to aim
  • Left click to shoot
  • U to toggle fullscreen mode
